summary: Adolphe 'Dolfo' Rashevski travels to Israel with grandson Ric, but his brother, orthodox rabbi Samuel 'Shmouel, refuses to come attend their fellow Auschwitz survivor sister Rosa's funeral.... See full summary »
cast: Natan Cogan|Ishai Golan|Mosko Alkalai|Rudi Rosenberg|Michel Jonasz|Tania Garbarski|Daniel Mesguich|Ludmila Mikaël|Jonathan Zaccaï|Hippolyte Girardot|Sébastien Radovitch|Michel Wouters|Selma Kouchy|Laurent Capelluto|Alexander Wajnberg|Christine Cavenelle|Shérif Scouri|Véronique Biefnot|Henri Wajnberg|Charlie Dupont|Laurence Masliah|Serge Mauro
title: Le tango des Rashevski
